metadata.feature_description: Show activity indicator icon for users with viewable activities

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Display activity icon for regular users

steps.action: Navigated to Users panel in PersonaBar
steps.expected: User list should display with activity icons visible for regular users
steps.actual: User list displayed correctly with activity icons (running person icon) visible for all regular users including EmptyTest User, Test Regular User, Test NewUser, Regular TestUser, Claude TestUser, etc.

steps.action: Searched for 'host' to find SuperUser Account
steps.expected: SuperUser should NOT have activity icon displayed
steps.actual: SuperUser Account (host) displayed with only Profile Settings, Account Settings, and menu icons - NO activity icon was shown, confirming the code logic that returns false for isSuperUser

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify icon click opens activity tab

steps.action: Clicked on User Activity icon for Claude TestCreate user
steps.expected: User Activity details panel should open showing activity information
steps.actual: User Activity panel expanded showing: Last Active (1 minute ago), Rank (14), Reputation (5), Experience (5), Edit Points button, Engagement (0), Influence (0), Total Contributions (0), and Recent Activity (Joined Site 1 minute ago - EVOQ CONTENT LIBRARY)

observations: Code in permissionHelpers.js:20-22 shows showUserActivity() returns false when user.isSuperUser is true, which matches observed behavior
Activity icon uses SvgIcons.ActivityIcon from dnn-react-common library
UserActivityDetails component renders the full activity panel with Last Active, Rank, Reputation, Experience, Engagement, Influence, Total Contributions, and Recent Activity
SHOW_USER_ACTIVITY permission is required for non-admin users to see activity icons (not tested as logged in as admin)
